attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.desc: Sets the text display value. ;Bound Value

attrs.name: placeholder
attrs.desc: Set the placeholder text in the text box.

attrs.name: popper-class
attrs.desc: Add a class name for the popper. For details, see the popover component.

attrs.name: popper-append-to-body
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to insert a pop-up box to the body element. If a fault occurs in locating the fault in the dialog box that is displayed, you can set this attribute to false (for details, see the select component).
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: fetchRole
attrs.desc: User-defined API for obtaining the role list. This parameter is mandatory when the framework service is not used.

attrs.name: fetchCurrentRole
attrs.desc: User-defined interface for obtaining the role of the current user. This parameter is mandatory when the framework service is not used.

attrs.name: fields
attrs.desc: Customized data mapping. This parameter is mandatory when the framework service is not used.

events.name: change
events.desc: This event is triggered after the current role is switched.
